name: Dungeon Wyrm
description:
Control the dungeon wyrm and eat all those delicious monster eggs you can get. When you manage to get all of them go to a lower floor to find more!

Arrow keys - Control the wyrm
Space - Do a short burst of speed
Ctrl - Slow down a little bit for a short while

Get the longest wyrm there is! Let me know in the comments how long you got!
